TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit NativeActivityMetadata extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 表示由設定的 導入至執行環境的引數、子活動、變數及委派之集合。

span.span: Represents the set of arguments, child activities, variables, and delegates that a configured introduces to the execution environment.

span.span: The argument to add to the collection.

span.span: Adds an argument to the collection of arguments of an activity.

summary.span: 將所指定活動新增至中繼資料的子活動清單。

span.span: Adds the specified activity to the metadata's list of child activities.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddChild(class System.Activities.Activity child) cil managed

span.span: The activity to add.

summary.span: 將所指定活動新增至中繼資料的子活動清單。

span.span: Adds the specified activity to the metadata's list of child activities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 加入的活動是可由父活動直接排程的子活動。An activity added using is a child activity that the parent activity can schedule directly. 這些活動要由活動的消費者提供。These activities are to be provided by the consumer of the activity. 活動的 集合就是這種活動的範例。An example of this is the collection of a activity. 這些活動 (和其使用 或 加入的任何活動) 可存取透過 加入的變數。These activities (and any activities they add using or ) have access to variables added through .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果主機並未提供型別 `T` 的擴充，則會評估這個擴充提供者並為其提供。If the host does not provide an extension of type `T`, then this extension provider is evaluated to provide one.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 加入的活動是可由父活動直接排程的子活動。An activity added using is a child activity that the parent activity can schedule directly. 這些活動是此活動的實作詳細資料。These activities are implementation details of the activity. 這些活動 (和它們加入使用的任何活動或是) 可以存取此活動的引數，以及透過加入的變數。These activities (and any activities they add using or ) have access to this activity's arguments as well as variables added through .

span.span: Adds the specified activity to the metadata's list of imported child activities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 匯入的子活動是不會由父活動直接排程的子活動，An imported child activity is a child activity that the parent activity does not schedule directly. 而是父系使用此活動設定的其他子活動。Rather, then parent uses this activity to configure some other child activity.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddVariable(class System.Activities.Variable variable) cil managed

span.span: The variable to add.

summary.span: 將所指定變數新增至中繼資料的變數集合。

span.span: Adds the specified variable to the metadata's collection of variables.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法加入的變數會視為活動的公開可設定介面的一部分，也就是說，它們是由活動消費者所提供。Variables added using this method are considered part of the activity's publicly configurable surface, that is, they are to be provided by the consumer of the activity. 活動的實作無法存取使用此方法加入的變數。An activity's implementation cannot access variables added using this method. 透過 或 加入的活動 (和任何其非實作子活動) 可以存取使用此方法加入的變數。Activities added through or (and any of their non-implementation child activities) can access variables added using this method.

.method public hidebysig instance void AddVariable(class System.Activities.Variable variable, object origin) cil managed
public: void AddVariable(System::Activities::Variable ^ variable, System::Object ^ origin);

The origin of the variable.
